task.title: Accessing path views
task.shortdesc: You can access the three path view types for your completed reports that contain results data.

step.cmd: Open the report that you want to view.

substep.cmd: In the title bar, click Report Status.

info.p: When the processing of a report is completed, the report is shown in the Completed reports list.

substep.cmd: Under Completed reports, select the report that you want to view.

info.note: If the report returned results, it is listed in the menu as "Completed" with the date and time that the report finished running. If the report is listed as "No data found", you can try modifying the report criteria to obtain results.
info.p: The Channel Summary of the report opens with the Separated view displayed by default.

step.cmd: To toggle between report views, select the views from the options that are displayed above the results: Separated view, Time-lapsed view, or Merged view.
